Author: Marijn Haverbeke
Subject: Simplify and optimize string handling in comment extension
Message:
- Calling line.slice is potentially expensive for long lines
 - No need to scan character-by-character, slice + == is plenty fast
 - Adds recognition of block comments that start/end inside the
   selection

Issue #193

Author: Marijn Haverbeke
Subject: Start on a new build process
Message:
tsc is, for some reason, way faster when it watches the whole project at once,
so this weirds up the build process to be able to make use of that. Cuts rebuild
times from multi-seconds to almost instantaneous.

Drops support for CommonJS bundles.
